data.event: The county was organized in 1818 and named in honor of former President Thomas Jefferson.
In 1980 the county contained the mean center of U.S. population.
Governor Mel Carnahan was killed near Goldman, Missouri in a plane crash on October 16, 2000.

event.title: will be in the totality path of the solar eclipse of August 21, 2017

data.event: Much of Jefferson County will be in the totality path of the solar eclipse of August 21, 2017.
